CustomField.description: #Case_Mgt_v1: Auto notification emails opt out option provided to all Contacts RQ-004381 : Contact page layout optimisation
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This opt-out applies to the Case acknowledgement email sent upon case creation. Please tick this box if the customer does not wish to receive a case creation acknowledgement email.
CustomField.label: Case Mgt Auto-Notification Opt Out
